title: Downtown Cleveland
posting_body: This 2 Bed 2 Bath is a very spacious floor plan with very large walk-in closets in both bedrooms, two large hallway closets, and a washer and dryer.
This suite also has granite countertops, maple cabinetry, stainless steel appliances and large floor-to-ceiling windows.
Price reduced from $2030 to $1830 per month!!!!
We have attached covered parking for $165 per month
We offer a 24/7 multi-level on-site "FitWorks" gym with a reduced resident rate.
We have two great restaurants in the building that offer convenience to our residents, as well as a free business center, weekly paper shredding service and dry cleaning self-service lockers.
Schedule your tour to see our suites today!
Mon, Wed, Fri - 9am-5:30pm, Tues, Thurs - 9am-6pm, Sat - 10am-3:30pm
